Message Examples
fields.options:
Message Example
<h3>Order Overdue</h3>

<p>Transaction {{ doc.name }} has exceeded Due Date. Please take necessary action.</p>

<!-- show last comment -->
{% if comments %}
Last comment: {{ comments[-1].comment }} by {{ comments[-1].by }}
{% endif %}

<h4>Details</h4>

<ul>
<li>Customer: {{ doc.customer }}
<li>Amount: {{ doc.grand_total }}
</ul>
